title: Spoilers Ahoy! The Last of Us Part 2
description: *SPOILER ALERT* This week’s episode goes all-in on The Last of Us Part II and leaves no virtual corpse unturned. Together, The Besties break down the plot, discuss the controversy and explore in-depth the failings of this game’s bleak view on justice.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
